Description.Text:
Position The Caesar Hotel in Pesaro, is located on the beach, a few meters from the beach. The city center is just a few hundred meters.
Restaurant The restaurant is characterized by a wide choice of cuisine and refined menu of meat and fish for lunch and dinner with buffet of vegetables and antipasti. The breakfast is served on the terrace and offers a range of sweet and savory products. One night a week is dedicated to the tasting of typical local menu culminating in an evening of dancing on the terrace.
More Informations At guests' disposal swimming pool with Jacuzzi and solarium area with sun loungers and parasols. Ideal after a swim in the sea or in the evening to return to the hotel, the swimming pool is available for guests of the hotel even at night. To relax on the terrace on the second floor of the hotel you will find sun loungers and a fitness corner to keep in shape during your vacation.
